name: Congee (Rice Porridge)
description: Super easy and delicious recipe for congee (Asian rice porridge) with tempeh, edamame, and pak choi. Don't miss out on this healthy Asian comfort food!
recipeIngredient: 2 small heads pak choi, cut into slices

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the sesame oil in a medium pot and cook the rice and the garlic for 1-2 minutes. Then add the vegetable broth, bring to boil and turn down the heat to a simmer. Partially cover and continue to simmer for 1 to 1 1/2 hours. Stir occasionally with a wooden spoon. Towards the end stir more often to make it creamier. Add more vegetable broth or water if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, make the tempeh. Heat some more sesame oil in a pan, add the tempeh, the soy sauce, and the paprika powder and cook for 4 minutes or until crispy. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, make the tempeh. Heat some more sesame oil in a pan, add the tempeh, the soy sauce, and the paprika powder and cook for 4 minutes or until crispy. Season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Then make the pak choi. Heat 1/2 a tablespoon of water in a medium pan with a lid and steam the pak choi for about 3 minutes. Season with a splash of soy sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the congee (warm) with the toppings and top it off with a little bit of soy sauce and sriracha.
